Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin SELECT * from [Utilisateur] where Email = @Email and MotDePasse = HASHBYTES('SHA2_512', dbo.GetPreSalt() + @MotDePasse + dbo.GetPostSalt()); End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin insert into Adresse(Numero, Rue, Ville, CodePostal, Pays) values (@numero, @rue, @ville, @codePostal, @Pays); RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin insert into Categorie_piece(Categorie) values (@Categorie); RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin insert into Commande([status], [date], UtilisateurId) values ( @status, @date, @UtilisateurId); RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin insert into Marque (Nom_Marque) values (@Nom_Marque); RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin insert into Piece (Nom, Reference, Prix, MarqueId) values (@Nom, @Reference, @Prix, @MarqueId); RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Insert into [Utilisateur] ([Nom], [Prenom], [Email], [Telephone], [MotDePasse], [Role], [AdresseId]) Values (@Nom, @Prenom, @Email, @Telephone, HASHBYTES('SHA2_512', dbo.GetPreSalt() + @MotDePasse + dbo.GetPostSalt()), @Role, @AdresseId); End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin update Adresse set Numero = @numero, Rue = @rue, Ville = @ville, CodePostal = @codePostal, Pays = @Pays
where Id = @Id RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin update Categorie_piece set Categorie = @Categorie where Id = @Id RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin update Commande set [Status] = @status, [Date] = @date, UtilisateurId = @UtilisateurId where Numero = @Numero
RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin update Marque set Nom_Marque = @Nom_Marque where Id = @Id RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin update Piece set Nom = @Nom, Reference = @Reference, Prix = @Prix, MarqueId = @MarqueId where Id = @Id
RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin update Utilisateur set Nom = @Nom, Prenom = @Prenom, Email = @Email, Telephone = @Telephone, MotDePasse = @MotDePasse, [Role] = @Role where Id = @Id
RETURN 0 end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[GetPostSalt] ( ) RETURNS NCHAR(2048) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[GetPreSalt] ( ) RETURNS NCHAR(2048) AS
